column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This pizza was a wonderful ending to our day! We had the Chicago special which was peppers
column3: sausage and mushrooms. The tomato sauce was spot on and homemade. It truly made the pizza spectacular. We also got a salad which is a great pairing with a deep dish pizza. The pizza was delicious and the small was big enough for two people. Definitely will be back to have this pizza again.
